content: शिरस् {%<ab>n.</ab>%} [शॄ-असुन् निपातः <ls>Uṇ. 4. 193</ls>] {@--1@} The head; शिरसा श्लाघते पूर्वं (गुणं) परं (दोषं) कंठे नियच्छति <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls> {@--2@} Skull. {@--3@} A peak, summit, top (as of a mountain); हिमगौरैरचलाधिपः शिरोभिः <ls>Ki. 5. 17</ls>; <ls>Śi. 4. 54.</ls> {@--4@} The top of a tree. {@--5@} The head or top of anything; शिरसि मपीपटलं दधाति दीपः <ls>Bv. 1. 74.</ls> {@--6@} Pinnacle, acme, highest point. {@--7@} Front, forepart, van (as of an army); पुत्रस्य ते रणशिरस्ययमग्रयायी <ls>Ś. 7. 26</ls>; <ls>U. 5. 3.</ls> {@--8@} Chief, principal, head (usually at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>).
